translations.english: Yiji persuaded Pei Gong to attack Chenliu by surprise.

translations.chinese: 沛公以為廣野君，以其弟商為將，將陳留兵。
translations.english: Pei Gong made him Lord Guangye and appointed his younger brother Shang as general, commanding the Chenliu troops.
In the third month, they attacked Kaifeng but failed to capture it.

translations.chinese: 西與秦將楊熊會戰白馬，又戰曲遇東，大破之。
translations.english: They met Qin general Yang Xiong in battle at Baima to the west, and again at Quyu to the east, greatly defeating him.

translations.chinese: 楊熊走之滎陽，二世使使斬 之以徇。
translations.english: Yang Xiong fled to Xingyang. The Second Emperor sent an envoy to execute him as a warning to others.
